title: Th-thunderstoreer?

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Install a mod onto the game. Start an event from [#1203735894981345361](https://discord.com/channels/970041597590929519/1203735894981345361). Host may rule 17 your choice, forcing you to choose a new one. Everyone privately votes on how good your chosen event is for the game on a scale from one to ten, which is then averaged.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your defense is equal to the quality of your latest mod (1-3: None 4-5: Basic 6-8: Powerful 9-10: Invincible)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Install 3 mods, at least 2 being an 8/10 or above

desc:
Post 5300
*I remember using this for rounds and lethal company mods*
